Package game.actor.player

Class Invader

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.actor.enemy.Enemies
game.actor.player.Invade
game.actor.player.Invader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, RunesSource, Resettable
public class Invader extends Invade
A subclass of Invade that represents an invader in the game. This class represents an invader entity in the game. Invaders are hostile actors that can perform actions based on their behaviors and interact with other actors.
Author:
Belvinjeet Kaur

    • Invader

      public Invader(String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints, WeaponItem weaponItem)
      Constructor for the Invader class.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the invader.
      displayChar - The character used to display the invader.
      hitPoints - The initial hit points of the invader.
      weaponItem - The weapon item held by the invader.

  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Plays a turn for the invader. This method determines the actions to be performed by the invader during its turn. It considers the surrounding environment and available behaviors to select the appropriate action.
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Enemies
      Parameters:
      actions - The list of available actions.
      lastAction - The last action performed.
      map - The game map.
      display - The display used for visualization.
      Returns:
      The action to be performed by the invader.

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Actor otherActor, String direction, GameMap map)
      Returns the list of allowable actions for the invader. This method determines the actions that the invader can perform when interacting with another actor in the specified direction on the given game map.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Enemies
      Parameters:
      otherActor - The actor being interacted with.
      direction - The direction of interaction.
      map - The game map.
      Returns:
      The list of allowable actions for the invader.

      public int generateRunes()
